amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the person under State law who is authorized to control the funds for a particular program is also authorized to develop procedures to resolve disputes over the content of the local plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the procedures established in the bill for resolving disputes over the content of local plans for youth development and career preparation programs. The amendment specifies that whoever is authorized to control the funds for a particular program shall be the entity responsible for developing dispute resolution procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sawyer amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
